A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Vacuous film. So very disappointing. I had hope after The Force Awakens and dare i say excited after Rogue One\, but nay\, Disney went full Disney. Story? Meh\, why bother. Its apparent they just dont care\, if you are a fan of Star Wars save your money and more importantly dont encourage this shameful excuse of a cash grab. You aren’t missing anything.
